TopicTitle: Honestly don't know where to put this thread...

Articles.Content:
So.. As the title says I don't know where the thread would best go, mods? Please lend me a hand..

Anyway on to bussiness. A long time ago I saw someone on the forums had instructions on how to change the KSP navball from its current colored form to black for land and white for the sky, the indicator I don't rmemeber. But its a black and white navball and my google search is turning up nothing.

If anyone knows where its at or what I'm even talking about please help out a fellow kerbonaught?
That was quick... Thank you thats exactly the same thread. Sorry for the trouble of not knowing where to put this thread. Thanks again!
For future reference, questions about modifications to KSP are probably best off in General Add-on Affairs (where I've moved this for now), or else in Add-on Requests and Support.

okay thanks, its not really an add on which is why I wasn't sure but thank you!

okay thanks, its not really an add on which is why I wasn't sure but thank you!

Technically speaking, anything that modifies the standard KSP installation is generally considered an add-on or a tweak.

Technically speaking, anything that modifies the standard KSP installation is generally considered an add-on or a tweak.

True, but I was thinking along tghe lines of.. I'm looking for a thread that talks about the mod, not the actual mod since there was never a dev or release thread.
I guess it's ok that it was in an incorrect-but-more-viewed category, since the reply was faster (not that I'm encouraging confusing among sub-forums!)
